titles: One come from the dead, to awaken drunkards and whoremongers being a sober and severe testimony against the sins and the sinners, in an exact description of the nature and danger of these two soul-destroying evils : together with proper and sovereign remedies / by Richard Garbut ... ; with epistles to the reader, by Mr. R. Baxter, and Mr. William Jenkins.
author: Garbutt, Richard.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
"The epistle to the reader" by Richard Baxter is dated London, August 23, 1675.
keywords: Drinking of alcoholic beverages --  Great Britain --  Controversial literature.
